ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.bootstrap.v1alpha1.Init.description: Init is the Schema for the inits API

spec.description: InitSpec defines the desired state of Init

commitSave.description: Save a startup configuration after each commit.
commitSave.title: Commit Save

mgmt.description:
Optional management interface settings.
Allows setting DHCP clients or static IPs as well as
the IP MTU.

ipMTU.description: Set the management interface IP MTU.
ipMTU.title: IP MTU

staticRoutes.description: Optional list of static routes to add to the management network instance as part of the initial configuration.
staticRoutes.title: Static Routes

mgmt.title: Mgmt

nodeSelector.description:
Optional node selectors to perform initial configuration for.
If not provided initialization is performed for all nodes.
nodeSelector.title: Node Selector

spec.title: Specification

status.description: InitStatus defines the observed state of Init
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.bootstrap.v1alpha1.InitLis.description: InitList is a list of inits

com.nokia.eda.bootstrap.v1alpha1.Managem.description: ManagementRouter is the Schema for the managementrouters API

spec.description: ManagementRouterSpec defines the desired state of ManagementRouter

nodeSelector.description: Selects TopoNodes on which to configure the management VRF. When left empty, all TopoNodes are selected.
nodeSelector.title: Node Selector

nodes.description: List of TopoNodes on which to configure the management VRF. When left empty, all TopoNodes are selected.
nodes.title: Nodes

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ManagementRouterStatus defines the observed state of ManagementRouter
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.bootstrap.v1alpha1.Managem.description: ManagementRouterList is a list of managementrouters

get.description:
read the specified Init.  If a git hash query parameter
is supplied, the resource as it existed at the time of the git hash
will be returned. Streaming is not supported when a particular revision
is asked for.

parameters.name: namespace

parameters.name: stream

parameters.name: hash
